name: Bridal Makeover
description: I am an expert in Bridal Makeovers. Your marriage day is your day to look like a Queen and I can make sure you do look like a Queen.

name: Party Makeup
description: Every party is unique and you should dress uniquely. I make you unique and make you stand out of the rest. Can do any style you want.

name: Full Makeover
description: A full makeover could be haircut and make up, full program of detox and body treatments, facial, shopping trip and life coaching
